00022 Service * Factory::Create( const SimpleString ServiceName, const SimpleString ClassName )
00023 {
00024     if ( ServiceName.IsEmpty() )
00025     {
00026         return NULL;
00027     }
00028
00029     // Init ServiceControl layer if needed
00030     OmiscidServiceControlLayerInit();
00031
00032     // construct the service
00033     Service * NewOmiscidService = new OMISCID_TLM Service(ServiceName, ClassName);
00034
00035     // Return the service
00036     return NewOmiscidService;
00037 }
